thread.title: With Summer In Full Gear, Manhattan Beach Marriott Announces Bike And Picnic Offer

author: cbs8
title: With Summer In Full Gear, Manhattan Beach Marriott Announces Bike And Picnic Offer
text:
Manhattan Beach Marriott
Hotel near Redondo Beach is offering daily bike rentals for $30 per person and grab-and-go picnic lunches for $12 per person. Come play in our backyard!
MANHATTAN BEACH, Calif. , July Manhattan Beach locals and visitors alike have yet another reason to get pumped this summer. Manhattan Beach Marriott has announced that it will offer bike rentals and pre-packed picnic lunches throughout the season, giving adventure-seekers the opportunity to explore the city in an exciting new way.
Participants can rent bikes for $10 per hour or just $30 for the entire day, and picnic lunches are available for $12 . Hotel guests and locals who take advantage of this offer will also receive a complimentary beach towel for the day â€“ ideal for seaside lunching and lounging. All prices are per person.
Known for its ample sunshine, mild year-round climate, pristine beaches and countless attractions , Manhattan Beach is the perfect destination for memorable summer getaways. Amateur athletes, performance art enthusiasts and savvy shoppers will all find something to love in this charming coastal city.
Surf, ski or simply soak up the sun on the sugary white shores of Manhattan Beach , located just 10 minutes from the hotel's front doors. Or, enjoy a musical or dance show at the Redondo Beach Performing Arts Center, just five minutes away. Manhattan Beach Marriott also offers quick access to Downtown Manhattan Beach , which features dozens of unique shops as well as a weekly farmers market.
Golfers will enjoy the Manhattan Beach hotel's on-site par-3 golf course , which offers a putting green and golf shop as well as rentals and lessons. Additional amenities designed for active visitors include a state-of-the-art health club and resort-style outdoor pool with private cabanas.
Manhattan Beach Marriott also boasts two acclaimed restaurants offering fresh and delicious California cuisine and beautiful golf course views. On Friday nights guests and locals can sip on handcrafted cocktails and listen to live music in the property's Escape Lounge. Several popular local eateries and bars are also within walking distance of the property.
Guest rooms and suites at the hotel feature stylish decor and innovative amenities including high-speed Internet access and flat-panel TVs with premium movie channels. Each room also offers an elegant marble bathroom, premium bath amenities and luxurious bedding for peaceful nights and refreshed mornings.
For more information on the bike and picnic offer at Manhattan Beach Marriott, contact the concierge desk at 1-310-546-7511.
About Manhattan Beach Marriott
Manhattan Beach Marriott at 1400 Parkview Ave. in Manhattan Beach, CA offers easy access to sandy white shores, crystal-clear Pacific waters, the cities of Redondo Beach , Hermosa Beach and El Segundo , and Los Angeles International Airport (LAX). The hotel features 7 floors with 373 guest rooms, 12 suites, a concierge level, 2 restaurants, a golf course, health club, heated outdoor pool and 25,000 square feet of flexible event space. Complimentary wireless Internet is provided in the lobby and all other public areas of the hotel. For information, visit www.marriott.com/LAXMN or call 1-310-546-7511. Follow Manhattan Beach Marriott on Twitter , like the hotel on Facebook and add it to a circle on Google Plus .
